Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Corpse
    A class that generates a Corpse object.
    CraftableWeapon
    A class for the weapons which may be crafted into better weapons
    CraftItemAction
    Special action for crafting new weapons from pre-existing weapons.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    DropWeaponBehaviour
    Allows an actor to drop the weapon if they're holding any
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    GetWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickUpItemAction if the current Actor is standing on a WeaponItem, if no weapon is available returns the null action
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    SayAction
    allows the actor to say something
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Weapon  
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ItemCapability  
    ZombieCapability
